amendment.description: To provide for the correction of a survey of certain land in the State of Alaska.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3310 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3310 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2150) To provide for the correction of a survey of certain land in the State of Alaska.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3310 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 2953.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3310 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
